title: this is why ppl like me cant climb out of bronze
body:
leona and zed kept thinking they could run into 2v5s
our warwick always wondered off without letting anyone know  before teamfights
garen split pushed bot lane while warwick went top and leona and zed were dead leaving me to defend 5 people destroying our inhib
warwick kept running into 1v5s to get an aoe fear despite no one being near him
leona stayed in the middle of the lane bming enemies and got caught and killed
all 5 of us havent grouped for a single teamfight because all of the above

bronze is impossible

replies.body:
But people doing those "unranked to bronze" series climb out of bronze and above in a couple days

learn how to carry

> [{quoted}](name=Azir Chroma,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MnAvXqLx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-10T04:51:06.300+0000)
>
> But people doing those "unranked to bronze" series climb out of bronze and above in a couple days
> 
> learn how to carry

carrying 4 retarded autistic drug addicts is next to near impossible to do in bronze i shouldnt HAVE to carry every game just so i can climb thats the problem with ranked its not based on your skills its based on who gets lucky and get somewhat decent teammates

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=MnAvXqLx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-10T05:21:31.085+0000)
>
> carrying 4 retarded autistic drug addicts is next to near impossible to do in bronze i shouldnt HAVE to carry every game just so i can climb thats the problem with ranked its not based on your skills its based on who gets lucky and get somewhat decent teammates

i did it in 2 days

its no where near impossible. its simple enough when you know what you have to do.

Edit: found an old screenshot of my smurf http://imgur.com/F6TEvjr

this one started bronze 5 IIRC, going off of lolkings MMR

another example here from this session

http://origin.lolking.net/summoner/na/64981354/TheSwegGod

the curve isnt as drastic because i didnt play much on it.
